> **[Local Government Transparency in Texas](http://TexasTransparency.org)**
> (external link, opens a new window).

Texas Government Code, Chapter 552, gives you the right to access government records. Review the Public Information Act below for the procedures to file an Open Records Request. Use the Open Records Request form to make a request for information and records. A charge may apply to your request.

* [Public Information Act](https://mpcity.net/wp-content/uploads/PublicInformationAct030721.pdf)
  (PDF)

  (PDF)
